review: Good recommendations by Dr Abhay. Understanding and treatment of ankle injury. Good guidance on medicine and physiotherapy.

My Injury was (patellar dislocation, trochlear dysplasia and MPFL Rupture) and  I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional care and expertise you provided during my knee surgery (Arthroscopy, MPFL reconstruction and Osteotomy) on June 24th without any complications.I am truly amazed by how quickly I am progressing, and I owe it all to your dedication and meticulous planning. Your assurance that everything would turn out normal gave me the confidence and peace of mind I needed to endure the process.Thank you for being more than just a doctor; you are a beacon of hope and a source of comfort for your patients. Your commitment to your profession and your patients is truly commendable. I am fortunate to have had you as my surgeon and will forever be grateful for the positive impact you've had on my life.Regards,Tulika Bose
Brilliant experience. Had a pain around shoulder.Doctor full of knowledge and patience. Highly recommend.

The doctor explains things in a very friendly manner. He not only prescribed medicines to cure the pain immediately, but also gave advice on how to keep the pain at bay in the long run. It was also very easy to follow up with him whenever required.
